roleset.name: difficult
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1.

example.name: arg1
example.text: As for who decides that could be tricky although I doubt it will be much of an issue .
example.arg: although I doubt it will be much of an issue

example.name: concatenation of arg1
example.text: Pomegranate is tricky to eat but it's popular enough, so we don't have an excuse for prickly pears.
